channel.title: Client won't run and compiler doesnt work
channel.description:
[b][u][i]COMPILER[/i][/u][/b] when i try to compile my cleint i get this error: The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
my code is: @echo off title Client cd .\Client\ "C:\Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
[b][i][u]RUN SERVER[/u][/i][/b]
i get this error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Launcher Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Launcher at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Launcher. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
my code is:
@echo off color 0a cd ./Client/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Launcher 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
please help me asap. trying to get on my server to see what i have to fix.
Thanks Ownageinacan

item.title: Client won't run and compiler doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @ownageinacan ownageinacan
item.description:
@ownageinacan wrote:

I tried eclipse but didnt work. since i started getting this error i coulsnt run any server’s clients.i get it with every client i try to run. WTF?

Read full topic

item.title: Client won't run and compiler doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @ownageinacan ownageinacan
item.description:
@ownageinacan wrote:

i tried that and i got this error now:

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Client won't run and compiler doesnt work

item.title: Client won't run and compiler doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @zygis227 zygis227
item.description:
@zygis227 wrote:

if you are using [pi]

@echo off title Building Files "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac" *.java pause

this is the compiler replace the 14 with your jdk version

@echo off Title Modern-Scape Client START javaw -Xmx256m Gui 32 0 highmem members 32 exit

run.

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

run win7

these work for [pi] and lol’d at your compiler its same as run just no color

Read full topic
item.source: Client won't run and compiler doesnt work

item.title: Client won't run and compiler doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @iskatefallens iskatefallens
item.description:
@iskatefallens wrote:

Try

my code is:
@echo off
title Client
cd .\Client
“C:\Program Files/Java/jdk6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

If that dosent work then go into you “C:/” program files, java, and find your JDK version and replace “jdk6” with your version of java. that should solve your compiler problem

Read full topic

item.title: Client won't run and compiler doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @ownageinacan ownageinacan
item.description:
@ownageinacan wrote:

COMPILER
when i try to compile my cleint i get this error:
The system cannot find the path specified.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

my code is:
@echo off
title Client
cd .\Client
“C:\Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

RUN SERVER

i get this error:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Launcher
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Launcher
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Launcher. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

my code is:

@echo off
color 0a
cd ./Client/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Launcher 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

please help me asap. trying to get on my server to see what i have to fix.

                        Thanks
                             Ownageinacan
